abstract: Large number of armored military and police-style vans available on Craigslist, eBay and other online marketplaces, while not illegal, have raises concerns among law enforcement officials, particularly after James Boulware's use of similar armored van in Dallas attack.
lead_paragraph: Scores of military and police-style vehicles for sale online look combat-ready, but law enforcement officials say most appear to be legal, so there is little they can do.

headline.main: Privately Owned Armored Trucks Raise Eyebrows After Attack on Dallas Police
headline.print_headline: Armored Trucks: In Good Supply and a Little Scary

snippet: Scores of military and police-style vehicles for sale online look combat-ready, but law enforcement officials say most appear to be legal, so there is little they can do.
